data.text:
Math Nation Update

We are excited to announce a significant update to Math Nation, which rolled out on June 6, 2024. As a part of this update, we will be migrating Math Nation users to an enhanced platform designed to improve the experience and functionality of our services.

Users will have access to the updated Math Nation during the summer months of June and July prior to the launch of the new school year. To ensure a smooth transition, please carefully review the information below. It provides updates and actions required for the integration you are using that will need to be communicated to teachers and students.

Roster Migration

Existing SSO Rosters (Clever, ClassLink, EdFi), OneRoster CSV, and manual roster users will be migrated to the new platform.

LMS Re-Integration

District and School System Administrators will need to re-integrate their Learning Management Systems (LMS) such as Schoology, Canvas, and Safari Montage with the updated Math Nation for the new school year.

STEP 1: Log into your Math Nation Admin account (District or School)

STEP 2: Click on the icon with your initials (top right) to open the settings menu.

STEP 3: Select the Admin role to access the Accelerate Learning Platform.

STEP 4: Select the Setup Wizard tab.

STEP 5: Select LMS and choose the LTI integration (Schoology, Canvas, Safari Montage) your schools will need to re-integrate.

If you have any questions or require assistance, please do not hesitate to reach out to us at Accelerate Learning.

A Powerful, Interactive Math Tool

Math Nation is a dynamic online resource that helps students master middle and high school mathematics. Math Nation provides 24-hour access to high-quality instructional videos, workbooks, collaborative learning tools, and adaptive assessments and support. To ensure these materials cover every concept students need to master to succeed in middle and high school math, we completely customize our content to the academic standards of each of our individual partner states and work with local universities to validate our alignment for each state.

Currently Math Nation provides custom-built resources in Florida, Mississippi, Michigan, and South Carolina. To learn more about Math Nation and how our tailor-made resources can help students in your state dramatically improve their performance in math, contact us today by sending a message on Accelerate Learning.

Please select your state to learn more.
